description: What is Asia? Students explore how concepts of culture, language, nation, race, and environment
define Asia today and in years
past and plan related projects for their Interim course.  Offered annually in the fall semester.
Counts toward Asian studies, Chinese, and Japanese
majors and Asian studies concentration. Prerequisite: CHIN 112 or JAPAN 112 or permission of
instructor; must be accepted into Asian Conversations program to register.
